name: Likeable Local, Inc.
description: Provider of social advertising services intended to automate social media for businesses. The company offers integrated software services for small businesses to create, enhance, and manage their social media presence through custom content creation, targeted media advertising, and an updated content library, enabling businesses to save time and resources and measure their growth.
